name: NSCondition
desc: A condition variable whose semantics follow those used for POSIX-style conditions.

items.name: func wait()
items.desc: Blocks the current thread until the condition is signaled.

items.name: func wait(until: Date) -> Bool
items.desc: Blocks the current thread until the condition is signaled or the specified time limit is reached.

items.name: func signal()
items.desc: Signals the condition, waking up one thread waiting on it.

items.name: func broadcast()
items.desc: Signals the condition, waking up all threads waiting on it.
